group_1.textRight: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yo, what is this? This stuff rocks!

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it tasty?
I promised Mami we'd come back here again.

group_1.textRight: Hey, now! Does that mean you've been here@before?
Without me?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry!
You were away when we came.

group_1.textRight: Eh, it's fine. We all got to come together@like this, so whatevs!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. I'm so happy we all got to come here@again.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I admit that the pancakes here are@good, but...
Aren't you making this a bigger deal than @it is?

group_1.textLeft: "No, it really is."
(Huh? My mouth is speaking on its own.)
"We're never going to get together like this.@Not ever."
"Because I..."

group_1.narration: I never went to help you, Mami.

group_1.textCenter: Was that really the right choice...?

group_1.textRight: Sup, Madoka? You wanted to talk?
Huh? Is Homura not here yet?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't call her.

group_1.textRight: So she called you yesterday, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: Me too.
Said she didn't want me to go to Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: And what did you say?

group_1.textRight: I didn't have an answer for her right then.@I told her to give me time to think about it.
I've made up my mind now, though.
I heard you decided not to go. Is that true?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
Mom and Dad were so worried, just from@me being missing for one day...
I got really scared when she told me we@might not make it back alive.
I don't want to upset my parents any more@than I already have.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I get it.

group_1.textLeft: Still though...I feel like a coward.
Mami's in Kamihama, and so are Iroha@and her friends.
If we didn't go we'd basically be turning a @blind eye to what's happening.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I mean, I think everything Homura said was @one hundred percent right.
I'm not very experienced as a Magical Girl.@Even if I did go...
I'd probably just get in the way, and I@wouldn't be any help.
Besides, there's a bunch of people who'd be@sad if I died.
I understand all that. I got an earful@yesterday, too.
But you know, I got to thinking.
Maybe there's something I can do...@Something I should do.

group_1.textLeft: So...

group_1.textRight: Yeah. I'm gonna go to Kamihama.
Even if I have to go by myself.

group_1.textLeft: No! You can't... Not alone!

group_1.textRight: Listen, I don't want you or Homura to@be in any danger.
Especially not when there's a risk we might@die.
So if you've decided not to go, I'm not@gonna be the one who forces you.

group_1.textLeft: So you're going to go by yourself?

group_1.textRight: Yeah.
I couldn't live with myself if I didn't.
I know you're going to be worried about me.@Sorry for that.

group_1.textLeft: That's not fair.

group_1.textRight: I know. Sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Can I have some time to myself?

group_1.textRight: Of course. I'll just head back.
I need to tell Homura about my decision.

group_1.textLeft: Their pancakes were sooo good!@I loved their tea, too.

group_1.textRight: Yes, this place has very high standards.@Let's come here with the others next time.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we should!

group_1.textCenter: There might not be anything I can do to@help.
I may end up just getting in the way...
But still, I know what I need to do.
